summary: This bill, H.R. 2499, introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to codify Executive Order 14248, which focuses on preserving and protecting the integrity of American elections. The bill assigns jurisdiction to the House Administration, Judiciary, and Ways and Means committees. The bill explicitly states that the Executive Order, entitled “Preserving and Protecting the Integrity of American Elections,” (90 Fed. Reg. 14005), will become law.
